oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Vespa orientalis, a new alien species in Romania
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Zachi, Mihai
RuicÄƒnescu, Adrian
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: introduced species
Vespa orientalis
Romania
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A new alien hornet species (Vespa orientalis) has been observed in the Northern part of Bucharest, Romania, and reported through to the social networking platform for naturalists and citizen scientists, iNaturalist. All records were taken in Bucharest during 2019 and 2020.
